name: Hold2Control
description:
You have to hold both Control Keys on your keyboard for a time.

If you fail to hold both keys, you will be 'punished' with annoying sounds.

While holding both keys you will be 'teased' with annoying sounds. (optional)

The game is over after the countdown has finished.

It could be a game for estim audio play.

The shipped app is Linux only, but the source code is included. You can run it on any system. Just install 'pygame' and run: 'python hold2control.py'
